title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-5.4 - Site conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-5.4 - Site conditions

State Regulations
(a) inspectors shall observe and report the following site conditions: (1)
the building perimeter for land grade and
water drainage directly adjacent to the foundation; (2)
trees and vegetation that adversely
affect the residential building; (3)
walkways, steps, driveways, patios and
retaining walls. (b) Home inspectors are not required to observe and report on the following site
conditions: (1)
fences and privacy
walls; (2)
the health and condition
of trees, shrubs and other vegetation. Notes
